Class IOtxt

  • java.lang.Object
    • utility.IOtxt

  • public final class IOtxt
extends Object
    Utility for processing text files.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    padriaan

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public static List<String> read(String the_path)
                         throws IOException
        Reads a text file.
        Parameters:
        the_path - Path to the text file.
        Returns:
        A list of lines extracted from the text file.
        Throws:
        IOException - For reading or writing errors.

      • overwrite

        public static void overwrite(String the_path,
             List<String> the_data)
                      throws IOException
        Overwrites a text file.
        Parameters:
        the_path - Path to the text file.
        the_data - Data to write to the file.
        Throws:
        IOException - If there's error during writing.

      • add

        public static void add(String the_path,
       String the_line)
                throws IOException
        Adds a line at the end of the file.
        Parameters:
        the_path - Path to the file.
        the_line - Line to be added.
        Throws:
        IOException - If there's error during reading.

      • write

        private static void write(String the_path,
         List<String> the_data,
         boolean the_add)
                   throws IOException
        Writes data into the text file.
        Parameters:
        the_path - Path to the file.
        the_data - Data to be written.
        the_add - True to add lines, false to overwrite the whole thing.
        Throws:
        IOException - If there's error when reading file.
